CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - Multi-policy selection
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now select multiple Insider Risk Management policies in the "Risk levels for Adaptive Protection" settings to assign risk levels in Adaptive Protection. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - Multi-policy selection
OldVersion.description: Admins can now select multiple Insider Risk Management policies in the "Risk levels for Adaptive Protection" settings to assign risk levels in Adaptive Protection. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Meetings will suggest follow up questions to ask it
CurrentVersion.description: When Copilot in Teams Meetings responds to a prompt, it will also suggest follow up prompts to ask Copilot that build on the prior response. These questions will generally be based on the response it gave prior, and could be related to honing in on a particular topic, asking for more details, or even reformatting the content into a table if appropriate.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Meetings will suggest follow up questions to ask it
OldVersion.description: When Copilot in Teams Meetings responds to a prompt, it will also suggest follow up prompts to ask Copilot that build on the prior response. These questions will generally be based on the response it gave prior, and could be related to honing in on a particular topic, asking for more details, or even reformatting the content into a table if appropriate.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to Stop Copilot while it is generating a response
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Teams will now have a 'stop' button after sending a prompt. This will allow the user to stop Copilot's response either before the response has started to generate, or even after the response is generating. The user may then start a new prompt if they wish.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel - Graph Grounded Chat
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot for answers grounded in your work content from the Microsoft Graph—your chats, documents, meetings, and emails—beyond your active Excel workbook. If you’re analyzing a workbook and want to enhance your understanding using information from another source in your tenant, just ask Copilot in Excel.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel - Graph Grounded Chat
OldVersion.description: Ask Copilot for answers grounded in your work content from the Microsoft Graph—your chats, documents, meetings, and emails—beyond your active Excel workbook. If you’re analyzing a workbook and want to enhance your understanding using information from another source in your tenant, just ask Copilot in Excel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection in Gov Cloud
CurrentVersion.description: Adaptive Protection will now be available in Government clouds. Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection in Gov Cloud
OldVersion.description: Adaptive Protection will now be available in Government clouds. Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Risky AI usage
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, Insider risk management will help admins identify risky AI usage. We are adding new detections of intentional and unintentional insider risk activity on generative AI apps that can pose a risk to an organization. Activities will include risky prompts containing sensitive info or risky intent and sensitive responses containing sensitive info or is generated from sensitive files or sites.  Coverage will span across Microsoft Copilots and 3P generative AI apps. These detections will also contribute to Adaptive Protection insider risk levels.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Risky AI usage
OldVersion.description:
With this update, Insider risk management will help admins identify risky AI usage. We are adding new detections of intentional and unintentional insider risk activity on generative AI apps that can pose a risk to an organization. Activities will include risky prompts containing sensitive info or risky intent and sensitive responses containing sensitive info or is generated from sensitive files or sites.  Coverage will span across Microsoft Copilots and 3P generative AI apps. These detections will also contribute to Adaptive Protection insider risk levels.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Universal Print: Pull Print queues
CurrentVersion.description: Pull Print enables IT Pros to offer their end users a simplified view of the print solution.  Specifically, IT Pros can set up virtualized printer(s) per location or region so that end users only need to know the name of one printer. Those users can securely release their own print jobs at any printer at that location or region, depending on the setup.

OldVersion.title: Universal Print: Pull Print queues
OldVersion.description: Pull Print enables IT Pros to offer their end users a simplified view of the print solution.  Specifically, IT Pros can set up virtualized printer(s) per location or region so that end users only need to know the name of one printer. Those users can securely release their own print jobs at any printer at that location or region, depending on the setup.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel with Python
CurrentVersion.description: With Copilot, you can use natural language to describe the analysis you want to perform, and it will automatically generate, explain, and insert Python code into your Excel spreadsheet. This integration unlocks powerful analytics via Python for visualizations, cleaning data, machine learning, predictive analytics, and more—without needing to be Python proficient yourself. We are updating this item to reflect that the feature is currently available within the USA, Australia, and the UK, and is still rolling out to all other geolocations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel with Python
OldVersion.description: With Copilot, you can use natural language to describe the analysis you want to perform, and it will automatically generate, explain, and insert Python code into your Excel spreadsheet. This integration unlocks powerful analytics via Python for visualizations, cleaning data, machine learning, predictive analytics, and more—without needing to be Python proficient yourself. We are updating this item to reflect that the feature is currently available within the USA, Australia, and the UK, and is still rolling out to all other geolocations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enhanced app discovery
CurrentVersion.description: With enhanced app discovery users can easily discover and use apps they've previously used in group chats, channels, and meetings, allowing them to consent to use the app everywhere in Teams with one click.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enhanced app discovery
OldVersion.description: With enhanced app discovery users can easily discover and use apps they've previously used in group chats, channels, and meetings, allowing them to consent to use the app everywhere in Teams with one click.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Prompt Gallery - Showing aggregate Likes on prompts
CurrentVersion.description: See the amount of likes for prompts in your organization in Copilot Prompt Gallery.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Prompt Gallery - Showing aggregate Likes on prompts
OldVersion.description: See the amount of likes for prompts in your organization in Copilot Prompt Gallery.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Copilot to search for answers from the web
CurrentVersion.description: Use Copilot in Excel to search for answers from the web and add it to your Excel workbook.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Copilot to search for answers from the web
OldVersion.description: Use Copilot in Excel to search for answers from the web and add it to your Excel workbook.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Separation of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 retention policy location from Microsoft Teams chats
CurrentVersion.description: Today, admins must manage retention and deletion for Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions using a retention policy location that also includes Microsoft Teams chats. This feature will provide a new location option to manage only Copilot interactions, separate from Microsoft Teams chats.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Separation of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 retention policy location from Microsoft Teams chats
OldVersion.description: Today, admins must manage retention and deletion for Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions using a retention policy location that also includes Microsoft Teams chats. This feature will provide a new location option to manage only Copilot interactions, separate from Microsoft Teams chats.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – Designated experts in communities
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing the Community Expert in Viva Engage to enhance the trust and utility of knowledge in your communities. Experts will be able to endorse accurate and credible answers and be recognized as community experts with a special label next to their name.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – Designated experts in communities
OldVersion.description: We are introducing the Community Expert in Viva Engage to enhance the trust and utility of knowledge in your communities. Experts will be able to endorse accurate and credible answers and be recognized as community experts with a special label next to their name.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Prompt suggestions in Copilot chat
CurrentVersion.description: Get started in Copilot chat quickly with automatic prompt suggestions that enhance your productivity by providing relevant and context-aware prompts based on your previous interactions.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Prompt suggestions in Copilot chat
OldVersion.description: Get started in Copilot chat quickly with automatic prompt suggestions that enhance your productivity by providing relevant and context-aware prompts based on your previous interactions.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sort Meeting Attendees
CurrentVersion.description: Allow user to sort meeting attendees in the tracking list alphabetically. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Sort Meeting Attendees
OldVersion.description: Allow user to sort meeting attendees in the tracking list alphabetically. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New policy for voice and face enrollment defaulting to 'On'
CurrentVersion.description: The new policy gives IT admins enhanced flexibility with distinct settings for voice and face enrollment. This adjustment provides greater control over managing these features, allowing organizations to tailor to their needs. Voice and face enrollment will be enabled by default, enabling voice isolation and speaker recognition in meeting rooms and enhancing intelligent meeting recaps and Copilot for meetings.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New policy for voice and face enrollment defaulting to 'On'
OldVersion.description: The new policy gives IT admins enhanced flexibility with distinct settings for voice and face enrollment. This adjustment provides greater control over managing these features, allowing organizations to tailor to their needs. Voice and face enrollment will be enabled by default, enabling voice isolation and speaker recognition in meeting rooms and enhancing intelligent meeting recaps and Copilot for meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Swap screens on Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description:
Admins can switch the screens of Teams Rooms on Android
devices in dual display mode remotely, correcting front-of-room display
issues without physical support. The screen swap control is accessible in
device settings and the Teams admin center.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Swap screens on Teams Rooms on Android
OldVersion.description:
Admins can switch the screens of Teams Rooms on Android
devices in dual display mode remotely, correcting front-of-room display
issues without physical support. The screen swap control is accessible in
device settings and the Teams admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Net Promoter Score survey on Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: Users can rate how likely they are to recommend Microsoft Teams Rooms from 1 to 5 as well as provide additional comments on Teams Rooms on Android devices.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Net Promoter Score survey on Teams Rooms on Android
OldVersion.description: Users can rate how likely they are to recommend Microsoft Teams Rooms from 1 to 5 as well as provide additional comments on Teams Rooms on Android devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Queues app on Teams phone devices
CurrentVersion.description: Queues app on Teams phone devices enhances call management capabilities by allowing agents to handle incoming calls, view call queues, and manage call history directly from their Teams phone devices, improving efficiency and ensuring effortless communication for agents.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Queues app on Teams phone devices
OldVersion.description: Queues app on Teams phone devices enhances call management capabilities by allowing agents to handle incoming calls, view call queues, and manage call history directly from their Teams phone devices, improving efficiency and ensuring effortless communication for agents.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private moderator replies to individual attendees
CurrentVersion.description: Allows moderators to answer questions from specific attendees without displaying the reply to the other participants. This capability can be helpful for sensitive questions, personal inquiries, or follow-up discussions that are not intended to be broadcast to the entire audience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private moderator replies to individual attendees
OldVersion.description: Allows moderators to answer questions from specific attendees without displaying the reply to the other participants. This capability can be helpful for sensitive questions, personal inquiries, or follow-up discussions that are not intended to be broadcast to the entire audience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence (Microsoft managed storage)
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, Admins can choose to store a copy of the file that resulted in a DLP policy match. The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity. To configure Microsoft managed storage, similar to customer managed storage, the user can go to endpoint DLP settings and select Microsoft managed storage. As compared to customer managed storage, the admin need not configure any additional settings like adding a blob, assigning permissions, or selecting storage in policy workflow.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence (Microsoft managed storage)
OldVersion.description: With this capability, Admins can choose to store a copy of the file that resulted in a DLP policy match. The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity. To configure Microsoft managed storage, similar to customer managed storage, the user can go to endpoint DLP settings and select Microsoft managed storage. As compared to customer managed storage, the admin need not configure any additional settings like adding a blob, assigning permissions, or selecting storage in policy workflow.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Admin management tasks enabled for all Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can manage membership, ownership, deletion, and restoration of Loop workspaces in the SharePoint Embedded admin center or PowerShell. These changes are visible within the Loop experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Admin management tasks enabled for all Loop workspaces
OldVersion.description: Admins can manage membership, ownership, deletion, and restoration of Loop workspaces in the SharePoint Embedded admin center or PowerShell. These changes are visible within the Loop experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Space analytics with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: In space analytics, use Copilot to analyze and explain key data points and trends in your space utilization graphs. It compares current utilization metrics such as occupancy, desk usage, and room bookings against previous time periods (e.g. last month, last quarter), highlighting important changes and trends.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Space analytics with Copilot
OldVersion.description: In space analytics, use Copilot to analyze and explain key data points and trends in your space utilization graphs. It compares current utilization metrics such as occupancy, desk usage, and room bookings against previous time periods (e.g. last month, last quarter), highlighting important changes and trends.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Require Existing Microsoft 365 Group for New Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: Ensure via optional IT admin policy that new shared Loop workspaces are connected to and managed by an existing Teams enabled Microsoft 365 Group.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Require Existing Microsoft 365 Group for New Loop workspaces
OldVersion.description: Ensure via optional IT admin policy that new shared Loop workspaces are connected to and managed by an existing Teams enabled Microsoft 365 Group.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved reporting – Additional report fields in the Time Clock export
CurrentVersion.description: We’ve expanded the functionality of the time clock export report by adding additional fields from Shifts. This enhancement provides you with a more comprehensive and detailed view of your scheduling data, making it easier to analyze and manage workforce activities.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved reporting – Additional report fields in the Time Clock export
OldVersion.description: We’ve expanded the functionality of the time clock export report by adding additional fields from Shifts. This enhancement provides you with a more comprehensive and detailed view of your scheduling data, making it easier to analyze and manage workforce activities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: VDI Status Indicator
CurrentVersion.description: This feature provides a visual optimization status indicator in Teams for VDI users. It will provide the user with an easy to understand status message (like ‘Optimized', or 'Not Optimized'), some contextual information about the optimization mode (optimized with the WebRTC-based solution or the new SlimCore-based solution), and in the not optimized case it will provide a brief description of the problem and an error code, for better supportability. It will also provide an option to repair Teams optimization mode if the user is not optimized (through a restart).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: VDI Status Indicator
OldVersion.description: This feature provides a visual optimization status indicator in Teams for VDI users. It will provide the user with an easy to understand status message (like ‘Optimized', or 'Not Optimized'), some contextual information about the optimization mode (optimized with the WebRTC-based solution or the new SlimCore-based solution), and in the not optimized case it will provide a brief description of the problem and an error code, for better supportability. It will also provide an option to repair Teams optimization mode if the user is not optimized (through a restart).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Data Loss Prevention to restrict Microsoft 365 Copilot processing on content with sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention is extended to Microsoft 365 Copilot. This feature will allow DLP policies to provide detection of sensitivity labels in enterprise grounding data and restrict access of the content in Microsoft 365 Copilot.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Data Loss Prevention to restrict Microsoft 365 Copilot processing on content with sensitivity labels
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention is extended to Microsoft 365 Copilot. This feature will allow DLP policies to provide detection of sensitivity labels in enterprise grounding data and restrict access of the content in Microsoft 365 Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Copilot Pages in OneNote
CurrentVersion.description: Access Copilot pages inside OneNote, along with all of your notes.

OldVersion.title: OneNote: Copilot Pages in OneNote
OldVersion.description: Access Copilot pages inside OneNote, along with all of your notes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview AI Hub – Data Assessments
CurrentVersion.description: Data assessments in Microsoft Purview AI Hub provides a way for admins to drive data security outcomes by creating scoped assessments, reviewing the data sensitivity and user accesses on locations, and performing remediation actions to mitigate risk.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview AI Hub – Data Assessments
OldVersion.description: Data assessments in Microsoft Purview AI Hub provides a way for admins to drive data security outcomes by creating scoped assessments, reviewing the data sensitivity and user accesses on locations, and performing remediation actions to mitigate risk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Extensibility for PSTN calls
CurrentVersion.description: Third-party application developers will be able to extend the PSTN calling experience in Teams with contextual information, making it possible for Teams users to have access to relevant data without leaving the call experience. This brings additional context and workflow integration into calling experiences and makes customer facing professionals more efficient by having data from line of business applications readily available. This functionality is available for developers to integrate their applications and add new functionality to calls.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Extensibility for PSTN calls
OldVersion.description: Third-party application developers will be able to extend the PSTN calling experience in Teams with contextual information, making it possible for Teams users to have access to relevant data without leaving the call experience. This brings additional context and workflow integration into calling experiences and makes customer facing professionals more efficient by having data from line of business applications readily available. This functionality is available for developers to integrate their applications and add new functionality to calls.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Auto-association of BYOD room devices in the Pro Management portal
CurrentVersion.description: Manually associating peripherals to rooms may feel like an endless task if your organization has several bring your own device (BYOD) rooms. IT admins can streamline the process and get enhanced inventory visibility with this feature which utilizes meeting room invite data to intelligently associate peripherals to these spaces.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Auto-association of BYOD room devices in the Pro Management portal
OldVersion.description: Manually associating peripherals to rooms may feel like an endless task if your organization has several bring your own device (BYOD) rooms. IT admins can streamline the process and get enhanced inventory visibility with this feature which utilizes meeting room invite data to intelligently associate peripherals to these spaces.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview AI Hub is released to general availability. Along with this release, the name has been rebranded to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI (DSPM for AI) and capabilities have been added that include supporting admin units, displaying AI policies that were created in Purview solutions, and supporting additional AI apps. A version of DSPM for AI is also available to additional licensing, specifically Microsoft 365 E3 and Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses. 

The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity, including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts, both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI
OldVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview AI Hub is released to general availability. Along with this release, the name has been rebranded to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI (DSPM for AI) and capabilities have been added that include supporting admin units, displaying AI policies that were created in Purview solutions, and supporting additional AI apps. A version of DSPM for AI is also available to additional licensing, specifically Microsoft 365 E3 and Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses. 

The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity, including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts, both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: New Queue experience in Bookings to manage appointments for the day with real time attendee wait status and SMS reminders
CurrentVersion.description: The new Queue experience in Bookings enables schedulers and Bookings users to view the status and monitor all scheduled in-person and virtual appointments. Users can quickly create or view an appointment and send staff and attendees email reminders and SMS text notifications.

OldVersion.title: Bookings: New Queue experience in Bookings to manage appointments for the day with real time attendee wait status and SMS reminders
OldVersion.description: The new Queue experience in Bookings enables schedulers and Bookings users to view the status and monitor all scheduled in-person and virtual appointments. Users can quickly create or view an appointment and send staff and attendees email reminders and SMS text notifications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Navigate meetings and messages hands-free with Teams in CarPlay
CurrentVersion.description: Stay connected on the move with Teams in CarPlay. Use Siri to respond to notifications and send messages in Teams. Easily join meetings and engage in discussions with quick actions like raising your hand.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Navigate meetings and messages hands-free with Teams in CarPlay
OldVersion.description: Stay connected on the move with Teams in CarPlay. Use Siri to respond to notifications and send messages in Teams. Easily join meetings and engage in discussions with quick actions like raising your hand.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Message recall in the Outlook app for iOS and Android
CurrentVersion.description: From the Outlook for iOS and Android apps, you can request Outlook to attempt to recall a message sent to a colleague within your organization

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Message recall in the Outlook app for iOS and Android
OldVersion.description: From the Outlook for iOS and Android apps, you can request Outlook to attempt to recall a message sent to a colleague within your organization

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections - New News feature in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: This update will replace the current Feed experience in Viva Connections across desktop, mobile, and web platforms with a SharePoint News reader experience. This new experience will present SharePoint news from the organizational sites, boosted news, users' followed sites, frequent sites, and people they work with in an immersive reader experience. This will include a Copilot-powered news summary as well, available only in Teams for Windows desktop in this initial release. February 2025: We inadvertently changed the status to Rolling Out, but the correct status is Development. We apologize for the inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections - New News feature in Microsoft Teams
OldVersion.description: This update will replace the current Feed experience in Viva Connections across desktop, mobile, and web platforms with a SharePoint News reader experience. This new experience will present SharePoint news from the organizational sites, boosted news, users' followed sites, frequent sites, and people they work with in an immersive reader experience. This will include a Copilot-powered news summary as well, available only in Teams for Windows desktop in this initial release. February 2025: We inadvertently changed the status to Rolling Out, but the correct status is Development. We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Enhanced User Settings experience in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Modernized user experience for leveraging general and notification settings within Viva Engage

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Enhanced User Settings experience in Viva Engage
OldVersion.description: Modernized user experience for leveraging general and notification settings within Viva Engage

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams:  Queues App – adding Service level for Realtime stats
CurrentVersion.description: Service level is now available as part of Queues App realtime stats. Authorized users will be able to review the Service level metric and adjust staffing accordingly.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams:  Queues App – adding Service level for Realtime stats
OldVersion.description: Service level is now available as part of Queues App realtime stats. Authorized users will be able to review the Service level metric and adjust staffing accordingly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Retention based on Last Accessed for files in OneDrive and SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: This creates the ability to apply Retention to each SharePoint or OneDrive item based on when it was last accessed by a user.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Retention based on Last Accessed for files in OneDrive and SharePoint
OldVersion.description: This creates the ability to apply Retention to each SharePoint or OneDrive item based on when it was last accessed by a user.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Scan cold files in SharePoint and OneDrive for sensitive information
CurrentVersion.description: This new capability will enable admins to scan existing files at rest in SharePoint or OneDrive for Business for sensitive data and classify and/or label them accordingly. This includes files that have never been scanned or scanned in some time.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Scan cold files in SharePoint and OneDrive for sensitive information
OldVersion.description: This new capability will enable admins to scan existing files at rest in SharePoint or OneDrive for Business for sensitive data and classify and/or label them accordingly. This includes files that have never been scanned or scanned in some time.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Summarize email attachments with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: You will now be able to summarize PDF, Word, and PowerPoint email attachments with Copilot in Outlook on the web and new Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Summarize email attachments with Copilot
OldVersion.description: You will now be able to summarize PDF, Word, and PowerPoint email attachments with Copilot in Outlook on the web and new Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Department graph for Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI
CurrentVersion.description: A new graph added to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI displays the departments of users interacting with M365 Copilot.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Department graph for Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI
OldVersion.description: A new graph added to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI displays the departments of users interacting with M365 Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): In Copilot Pages, the Chat can now be used to modify the Page
CurrentVersion.description: When a Chat and a Page are open side by side, prompts within the Chat can now be used to modify or add to the contents of the Page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy availability to all Microsoft 365 users
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot Academy will be accessible to users without Copilot licenses. Admins will have the option to select their preferred access settings for Copilot Academy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy availability to all Microsoft 365 users
OldVersion.description: Copilot Academy will be accessible to users without Copilot licenses. Admins will have the option to select their preferred access settings for Copilot Academy.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Share site's built-in agent
CurrentVersion.description: Allows the built in SharePoint agent on a site to be shared and used in Teams.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Share site's built-in agent
OldVersion.description: Allows the built in SharePoint agent on a site to be shared and used in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: SharePoint agent analytics on Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Explore how your employees used key SharePoint agent features over a given time period and understand the ROI.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: SharePoint agent analytics on Viva Insights
OldVersion.description: Explore how your employees used key SharePoint agent features over a given time period and understand the ROI.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: OneDrive files as knowledge sources for agents
CurrentVersion.description: Allow files from OneDrive to be added as a grounding source in the Sources tab when creating a custom agent. This would apply to agents created from both OneDrive and SharePoint.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: OneDrive files as knowledge sources for agents
OldVersion.description: Allow files from OneDrive to be added as a grounding source in the Sources tab when creating a custom agent. This would apply to agents created from both OneDrive and SharePoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Device and Device group-based policy scoping support for Endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, you can create a Purview Endpoint DLP policy and assign it to specific users or user groups. This feature will allow you to create and release features based on both users and machines. You can use this feature to achieve different policies for the same user on different devices.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Device and Device group-based policy scoping support for Endpoint DLP
OldVersion.description: Currently, you can create a Purview Endpoint DLP policy and assign it to specific users or user groups. This feature will allow you to create and release features based on both users and machines. You can use this feature to achieve different policies for the same user on different devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Local PTZ camera controls for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: If the camera is not currently auto-framing the room, in-room users can now control the Pan-Tilt-Zoom (PTZ) of the active camera to keep the focus where they want it.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Local PTZ camera controls for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Android
OldVersion.description: If the camera is not currently auto-framing the room, in-room users can now control the Pan-Tilt-Zoom (PTZ) of the active camera to keep the focus where they want it.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Design ideas for quick links webpart
CurrentVersion.description: Design Ideas now provides formatting suggestions for the quick links webpart. This includes suggesting icons and images for a given link, as well as showing how the webpart would look with different card sizes, for single quick link webparts in a section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot creates an automatic presentation summary
CurrentVersion.description: When you open a PowerPoint presentation, Copilot will automatically create a summary, making it easy to understand the content quickly.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: OneDrive: New annotation layout and tools for PDF editing
CurrentVersion.description: The new PDF annotation layout features a more intuitive design where all annotation tools are now conveniently located in a single row at the top of the screen. A new type of eraser has been added to allow for more precise editing which can remove annotations pixel by pixel.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: OneDrive: New annotation layout and tools for PDF editing
OldVersion.description: The new PDF annotation layout features a more intuitive design where all annotation tools are now conveniently located in a single row at the top of the screen. A new type of eraser has been added to allow for more precise editing which can remove annotations pixel by pixel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Introducing new IT administrator policies to control Town hall Event Access
CurrentVersion.description: Previously, Microsoft did not provide a way for Teams admins to control who can attend town halls that are created in their organization. With this new policy, tenant administrators can control who can attend town halls created by members in their organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Search with apps and agents personalized suggestionss
CurrentVersion.description: We are enhancing Teams search personalized suggestions to include apps and agents. When searching in Teams you will now also get apps and agent suggestions which dynamically update as you type.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Search with apps and agents personalized suggestionss
OldVersion.description: We are enhancing Teams search personalized suggestions to include apps and agents. When searching in Teams you will now also get apps and agent suggestions which dynamically update as you type.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint DLP support - Just-in-time on MacOS
CurrentVersion.description: You can use Endpoint data loss prevention (DLP) just-in-time (JIT) protection to block all egress activities on monitored files while waiting for policy evaluation to successfully complete. When JIT protection is enabled, and while policy evaluation is processing, Endpoint DLP blocks all egress activities for each user whose account is in the selected scope. Endpoint DLP audits the egress activities for all user accounts that have been excluded (via the Exclude setting) or are otherwise not in scope.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint DLP support - Just-in-time on MacOS
OldVersion.description: This feature ensures that policy tips are displayed only after recipients are added to an email, minimizing user disruption from DLP policy tips. With this improvement, relevant policy tips are only shown to users as they draft emails after the proper policy conditions are met.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: App ratings in in-context surfaces.
CurrentVersion.description: Now users will be able to view ratings when they view apps within the in-context store in teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Category Shortcuts in the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Easily organize your inbox with quick-access category shortcuts! The shortcuts you loved in classic Outlook for Windows will be available in the new Outlook for Windows, making it easier than ever to categorize emails. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: New email indicators to alert on exfiltration of business sensitive data to free public
CurrentVersion.description:
In this update, we are adding two new email indicators to Insider Risk Management.
1.  Sending email with attachments to free public domains: This alerts when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to a free public domain email, potentially leading to a data security incident. 

2. Sending email with attachments to self: This alerts when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to user's personal email account or emailing self, potentially leading to a data security incident. 
Admins with appropriate permissions can enable these indicators from the settings page and use these new indicators in the data leaks or data theft policy template.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 Copilot: Work from your recent prompts in Draft with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Based on what you're typing, Copilot in Word shows your most recent prompts, which you can use as-is or modify in Draft with Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: New Personalization settings
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is launching a new Personalization page which will help users personalize their individual experience on Purview.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Support large documents in Word Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Support customers referencing large documents

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): UX Transparency for Web Queries
CurrentVersion.description: With UX transparency of web grounding in Copilot, users will now be able to see the exact queries sent by Copilot in response to a user's prompt to the web for grounding, along with the list of websites being queried, enhancing their awareness and control over the process.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Design Ideas Suggests Images from Org Assets
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint Design ideas can now pull from your Org Asset images to use within design ideas. If available when performing image suggestion, the first 3 ideas will show suggestions with images from org assets, whereas the rest of the ideas will use stock images.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Design Ideas for Blank Flexible Sections
CurrentVersion.description: When you add a blank flexible section to your page, you will now be able to open up the Design Ideas panel to get blank section suggestions just as you can for standard sections.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Move to in the pop-out ribbon in New Outlook and Outlook for Web
CurrentVersion.description: The "Move To" option is now available in the pop-out ribbon in New Outlook and Outlook for Web, making it easier to organize emails. Quickly move messages to any folder without switching back to the main window. This update ensures a seamless and consistent email management experience.  #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance center: Insider Risk Management - Policy scoping enhancements
CurrentVersion.description:
With this release, Insider Risk Management administrators can include or exclude specific users, groups, and adaptive scopes within policies. We are also adding support for non-mail enabled Security Groups within IRM policies.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Collection policies support in IRM
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, IRM will start supporting collection policies. Collection policies allow customers to scope classification (SITs - Sensitive Information Types) and activities for scoped users. For device indicators based IRM policy, required collection policies will be automatically created in the background.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Generative AI apps activities as triggers in IRM
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, the generative AI apps indicators will be supported as triggers in Risky AI usage policy. With triggers, customers can define the conditions for bringing the user into the scope of a policy while the generative AI apps indicators are used to determine risk score.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Discovery of sensitive data sharing to any cloud application or website (inc. GenAI) via network layer
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, IRM will support the discovery of sensitive files and text shared to any cloud application or website (inc. GenAI) via network layer. This capability is based on integration with 3rd party network partners (with data being captured via network layer).

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Priority content support for Risky AI usage
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, Risky AI usage policy template will support priority content. Customers can define Sensitive Info Types (SITs), Trainable Classifiers, Sensitivity Labels as priority content, and get alerted only when the activity matches the selected priority content.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Advanced Review Set Query Editor
CurrentVersion.description: The Advanced Review Set Query Editor empowers reviewers to harness the power of real-time big data analytics on their review set data. This tool enhances data analysis by offering insights such as identifying top item types, spotting patterns, and trends within the review set. Reviewers can utilize powerful query constructs like complex filtering, pattern-based text extraction, and data format parsing to analyze and find key information specific to their case or organization. The results can then be visualized using time charts, histograms, and other flexible charting solutions, providing a comprehensive understanding of the data's story.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot summary for transferred calls
CurrentVersion.description: When a call is forwarded/transferred to another colleague, users can prompt Copilot to automatically summarize the context, open questions, etc. for the call as a briefing for the receiving colleague. This feature ensures that the recipient is well-informed about the previous conversations related to the transferred call, enhancing their understanding and preparedness.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join as attendees in Microsoft events from Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows can now join Microsoft events (webinars, town halls, structured meetings) as attendees. You can attend directly from the invited Teams Room, with the same features that attendees have for all events. Available in Teams Rooms Pro.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - Multi-policy selection
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now select multiple Insider Risk Management policies in the "Risk levels for Adaptive Protection" settings to assign risk levels in Adaptive Protection. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Meetings will suggest follow up questions to ask it
CurrentVersion.description: When Copilot in Teams Meetings responds to a prompt, it will also suggest follow up prompts to ask Copilot that build on the prior response. These questions will generally be based on the response it gave prior, and could be related to honing in on a particular topic, asking for more details, or even reformatting the content into a table if appropriate.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to Stop Copilot while it is generating a response
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Teams will now have a 'stop' button after sending a prompt. This will allow the user to stop Copilot's response either before the response has started to generate, or even after the response is generating. The user may then start a new prompt if they wish.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel - Graph Grounded Chat
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot for answers grounded in your work content from the Microsoft Graph—your chats, documents, meetings, and emails—beyond your active Excel workbook. If you’re analyzing a workbook and want to enhance your understanding using information from another source in your tenant, just ask Copilot in Excel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection in Gov Cloud
CurrentVersion.description: Adaptive Protection will now be available in Government clouds. Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Risky AI usage
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, Insider risk management will help admins identify risky AI usage. We are adding new detections of intentional and unintentional insider risk activity on generative AI apps that can pose a risk to an organization. Activities will include risky prompts containing sensitive info or risky intent and sensitive responses containing sensitive info or is generated from sensitive files or sites.  Coverage will span across Microsoft Copilots and 3P generative AI apps. These detections will also contribute to Adaptive Protection insider risk levels.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Universal Print: Pull Print queues
CurrentVersion.description: Pull Print enables IT Pros to offer their end users a simplified view of the print solution.  Specifically, IT Pros can set up virtualized printer(s) per location or region so that end users only need to know the name of one printer. Those users can securely release their own print jobs at any printer at that location or region, depending on the setup.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel with Python
CurrentVersion.description: With Copilot, you can use natural language to describe the analysis you want to perform, and it will automatically generate, explain, and insert Python code into your Excel spreadsheet. This integration unlocks powerful analytics via Python for visualizations, cleaning data, machine learning, predictive analytics, and more—without needing to be Python proficient yourself. We are updating this item to reflect that the feature is currently available within the USA, Australia, and the UK, and is still rolling out to all other geolocations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enhanced app discovery
CurrentVersion.description: With enhanced app discovery users can easily discover and use apps they've previously used in group chats, channels, and meetings, allowing them to consent to use the app everywhere in Teams with one click.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Prompt Gallery - Showing aggregate Likes on prompts
CurrentVersion.description: See the amount of likes for prompts in your organization in Copilot Prompt Gallery.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Copilot to search for answers from the web
CurrentVersion.description: Use Copilot in Excel to search for answers from the web and add it to your Excel workbook.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Separation of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 retention policy location from Microsoft Teams chats
CurrentVersion.description: Today, admins must manage retention and deletion for Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions using a retention policy location that also includes Microsoft Teams chats. This feature will provide a new location option to manage only Copilot interactions, separate from Microsoft Teams chats.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – Designated experts in communities
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing the Community Expert in Viva Engage to enhance the trust and utility of knowledge in your communities. Experts will be able to endorse accurate and credible answers and be recognized as community experts with a special label next to their name.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Prompt suggestions in Copilot chat
CurrentVersion.description: Get started in Copilot chat quickly with automatic prompt suggestions that enhance your productivity by providing relevant and context-aware prompts based on your previous interactions.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sort Meeting Attendees
CurrentVersion.description: Allow user to sort meeting attendees in the tracking list alphabetically. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New policy for voice and face enrollment defaulting to 'On'
CurrentVersion.description: The new policy gives IT admins enhanced flexibility with distinct settings for voice and face enrollment. This adjustment provides greater control over managing these features, allowing organizations to tailor to their needs. Voice and face enrollment will be enabled by default, enabling voice isolation and speaker recognition in meeting rooms and enhancing intelligent meeting recaps and Copilot for meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Swap screens on Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description:
Admins can switch the screens of Teams Rooms on Android
devices in dual display mode remotely, correcting front-of-room display
issues without physical support. The screen swap control is accessible in
device settings and the Teams admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Net Promoter Score survey on Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: Users can rate how likely they are to recommend Microsoft Teams Rooms from 1 to 5 as well as provide additional comments on Teams Rooms on Android devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Queues app on Teams phone devices
CurrentVersion.description: Queues app on Teams phone devices enhances call management capabilities by allowing agents to handle incoming calls, view call queues, and manage call history directly from their Teams phone devices, improving efficiency and ensuring effortless communication for agents.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private moderator replies to individual attendees
CurrentVersion.description: Allows moderators to answer questions from specific attendees without displaying the reply to the other participants. This capability can be helpful for sensitive questions, personal inquiries, or follow-up discussions that are not intended to be broadcast to the entire audience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence (Microsoft managed storage)
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, Admins can choose to store a copy of the file that resulted in a DLP policy match. The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity. To configure Microsoft managed storage, similar to customer managed storage, the user can go to endpoint DLP settings and select Microsoft managed storage. As compared to customer managed storage, the admin need not configure any additional settings like adding a blob, assigning permissions, or selecting storage in policy workflow.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Admin management tasks enabled for all Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can manage membership, ownership, deletion, and restoration of Loop workspaces in the SharePoint Embedded admin center or PowerShell. These changes are visible within the Loop experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Space analytics with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: In space analytics, use Copilot to analyze and explain key data points and trends in your space utilization graphs. It compares current utilization metrics such as occupancy, desk usage, and room bookings against previous time periods (e.g. last month, last quarter), highlighting important changes and trends.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Require Existing Microsoft 365 Group for New Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: Ensure via optional IT admin policy that new shared Loop workspaces are connected to and managed by an existing Teams enabled Microsoft 365 Group.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved reporting – Additional report fields in the Time Clock export
CurrentVersion.description: We’ve expanded the functionality of the time clock export report by adding additional fields from Shifts. This enhancement provides you with a more comprehensive and detailed view of your scheduling data, making it easier to analyze and manage workforce activities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: VDI Status Indicator
CurrentVersion.description: This feature provides a visual optimization status indicator in Teams for VDI users. It will provide the user with an easy to understand status message (like ‘Optimized', or 'Not Optimized'), some contextual information about the optimization mode (optimized with the WebRTC-based solution or the new SlimCore-based solution), and in the not optimized case it will provide a brief description of the problem and an error code, for better supportability. It will also provide an option to repair Teams optimization mode if the user is not optimized (through a restart).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Data Loss Prevention to restrict Microsoft 365 Copilot processing on content with sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention is extended to Microsoft 365 Copilot. This feature will allow DLP policies to provide detection of sensitivity labels in enterprise grounding data and restrict access of the content in Microsoft 365 Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Copilot Pages in OneNote
CurrentVersion.description: Access Copilot pages inside OneNote, along with all of your notes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview AI Hub – Data Assessments
CurrentVersion.description: Data assessments in Microsoft Purview AI Hub provides a way for admins to drive data security outcomes by creating scoped assessments, reviewing the data sensitivity and user accesses on locations, and performing remediation actions to mitigate risk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Extensibility for PSTN calls
CurrentVersion.description: Third-party application developers will be able to extend the PSTN calling experience in Teams with contextual information, making it possible for Teams users to have access to relevant data without leaving the call experience. This brings additional context and workflow integration into calling experiences and makes customer facing professionals more efficient by having data from line of business applications readily available. This functionality is available for developers to integrate their applications and add new functionality to calls.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Auto-association of BYOD room devices in the Pro Management portal
CurrentVersion.description: Manually associating peripherals to rooms may feel like an endless task if your organization has several bring your own device (BYOD) rooms. IT admins can streamline the process and get enhanced inventory visibility with this feature which utilizes meeting room invite data to intelligently associate peripherals to these spaces.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview AI Hub is released to general availability. Along with this release, the name has been rebranded to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI (DSPM for AI) and capabilities have been added that include supporting admin units, displaying AI policies that were created in Purview solutions, and supporting additional AI apps. A version of DSPM for AI is also available to additional licensing, specifically Microsoft 365 E3 and Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses. 

The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity, including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts, both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: New Queue experience in Bookings to manage appointments for the day with real time attendee wait status and SMS reminders
CurrentVersion.description: The new Queue experience in Bookings enables schedulers and Bookings users to view the status and monitor all scheduled in-person and virtual appointments. Users can quickly create or view an appointment and send staff and attendees email reminders and SMS text notifications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Navigate meetings and messages hands-free with Teams in CarPlay
CurrentVersion.description: Stay connected on the move with Teams in CarPlay. Use Siri to respond to notifications and send messages in Teams. Easily join meetings and engage in discussions with quick actions like raising your hand.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Message recall in the Outlook app for iOS and Android
CurrentVersion.description: From the Outlook for iOS and Android apps, you can request Outlook to attempt to recall a message sent to a colleague within your organization

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections - New News feature in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: This update will replace the current Feed experience in Viva Connections across desktop, mobile, and web platforms with a SharePoint News reader experience. This new experience will present SharePoint news from the organizational sites, boosted news, users' followed sites, frequent sites, and people they work with in an immersive reader experience. This will include a Copilot-powered news summary as well, available only in Teams for Windows desktop in this initial release. February 2025: We inadvertently changed the status to Rolling Out, but the correct status is Development. We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Enhanced User Settings experience in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Modernized user experience for leveraging general and notification settings within Viva Engage

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams:  Queues App – adding Service level for Realtime stats
CurrentVersion.description: Service level is now available as part of Queues App realtime stats. Authorized users will be able to review the Service level metric and adjust staffing accordingly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Retention based on Last Accessed for files in OneDrive and SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: This creates the ability to apply Retention to each SharePoint or OneDrive item based on when it was last accessed by a user.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Scan cold files in SharePoint and OneDrive for sensitive information
CurrentVersion.description: This new capability will enable admins to scan existing files at rest in SharePoint or OneDrive for Business for sensitive data and classify and/or label them accordingly. This includes files that have never been scanned or scanned in some time.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Summarize email attachments with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: You will now be able to summarize PDF, Word, and PowerPoint email attachments with Copilot in Outlook on the web and new Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Department graph for Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI
CurrentVersion.description: A new graph added to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI displays the departments of users interacting with M365 Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): In Copilot Pages, the Chat can now be used to modify the Page
CurrentVersion.description: When a Chat and a Page are open side by side, prompts within the Chat can now be used to modify or add to the contents of the Page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy availability to all Microsoft 365 users
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot Academy will be accessible to users without Copilot licenses. Admins will have the option to select their preferred access settings for Copilot Academy.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Share site's built-in agent
CurrentVersion.description: Allows the built in SharePoint agent on a site to be shared and used in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: SharePoint agent analytics on Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Explore how your employees used key SharePoint agent features over a given time period and understand the ROI.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: OneDrive files as knowledge sources for agents
CurrentVersion.description: Allow files from OneDrive to be added as a grounding source in the Sources tab when creating a custom agent. This would apply to agents created from both OneDrive and SharePoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Device and Device group-based policy scoping support for Endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, you can create a Purview Endpoint DLP policy and assign it to specific users or user groups. This feature will allow you to create and release features based on both users and machines. You can use this feature to achieve different policies for the same user on different devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Local PTZ camera controls for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: If the camera is not currently auto-framing the room, in-room users can now control the Pan-Tilt-Zoom (PTZ) of the active camera to keep the focus where they want it.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Design ideas for quick links webpart
CurrentVersion.description: Design Ideas now provides formatting suggestions for the quick links webpart. This includes suggesting icons and images for a given link, as well as showing how the webpart would look with different card sizes, for single quick link webparts in a section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot creates an automatic presentation summary
CurrentVersion.description: When you open a PowerPoint presentation, Copilot will automatically create a summary, making it easy to understand the content quickly.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: OneDrive: New annotation layout and tools for PDF editing
CurrentVersion.description: The new PDF annotation layout features a more intuitive design where all annotation tools are now conveniently located in a single row at the top of the screen. A new type of eraser has been added to allow for more precise editing which can remove annotations pixel by pixel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Introducing new IT administrator policies to control Town hall Event Access
CurrentVersion.description: Previously, Microsoft did not provide a way for Teams admins to control who can attend town halls that are created in their organization. With this new policy, tenant administrators can control who can attend town halls created by members in their organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Search with apps and agents personalized suggestionss
CurrentVersion.description: We are enhancing Teams search personalized suggestions to include apps and agents. When searching in Teams you will now also get apps and agent suggestions which dynamically update as you type.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint DLP support - Just-in-time on MacOS
CurrentVersion.description: You can use Endpoint data loss prevention (DLP) just-in-time (JIT) protection to block all egress activities on monitored files while waiting for policy evaluation to successfully complete. When JIT protection is enabled, and while policy evaluation is processing, Endpoint DLP blocks all egress activities for each user whose account is in the selected scope. Endpoint DLP audits the egress activities for all user accounts that have been excluded (via the Exclude setting) or are otherwise not in scope.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: App ratings in in-context surfaces.
CurrentVersion.description: Now users will be able to view ratings when they view apps within the in-context store in teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Category Shortcuts in the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Easily organize your inbox with quick-access category shortcuts! The shortcuts you loved in classic Outlook for Windows will be available in the new Outlook for Windows, making it easier than ever to categorize emails. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.description:
In this update, we are adding two new email indicators to Insider Risk Management.
1.  Sending email with attachments to free public domains: This alerts when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to a free public domain email, potentially leading to a data security incident. 

2. Sending email with attachments to self: This alerts when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to user's personal email account or emailing self, potentially leading to a data security incident.
